text: Manuel López Escámez (born 25 November 1985), commonly known as Manolo, is a Spanish footballer who plays for Real Murcia as a central midfielder. ==Club career== Born in Bullas, Region of Murcia, Manolo graduated from Ciudad de Murcia's youth setup, and made his senior debuts with the reserves, playing several seasons in the regional leagues. In the 2006 summer he was promoted to the main squad, in Segunda División. On 2 September 2006 Manolo played his first professional match, coming on as a late substitute in a 0–2 away loss against Xerez CD.El Xerez no falla ante el Ciudad de Murcia y vuelve a ganar (Xerez does not fails against Ciudad de Murcia and is back to winning ways); Marca, 2 September 2006 He scored his first goal on 5 May of the following year, netting his side's only in a 1–1 draw at Hércules CF.Tote salva un punto para el Hércules que seguirá sufriendo (Tote saves point for a Hércules which will keep suffering); Marca, 5 May 2007 On 2 August 2007 Manolo moved to Rayo Vallecano in Segunda División B.Tete y Manolo, nuevos jugadores del Rayo Vallecano (Tete and Manolo, new players of Rayo Vallecano); Rayo Herald, 2 August 2007 After appearing rarely in his first campaign, which ended in promotion, he still managed to appear in 14 matches during his second (only two starts, however). On 1 September 2009 Manolo left the Madrid outfit and joined CD Toledo, in the third level.Manolo se marcha al CD Toledo (Manolo goes to CD Toledo); Rayo Herald, 1 September 2009 He subsequently resumed his career in the lower leagues, representing CD Roquetas,Manolo, ex del CD Toledo, ficha por el Roquetas (Manolo, former CD Toledo player, signs for Roquetas); El Digital Deportivo, 30 August 2010 CD Bullense, UCAM Murcia CF, FC Jumilla and Real Murcia. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish footballers Category:Murcian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Segunda División players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Ciudad de Murcia footballers Category:Rayo Vallecano players Category:CD Toledo players Category:UCAM Murcia CF players Category:FC Jumilla players
title: Manolo (footballer, born 1985)
